title: siridEnum enakkini
sahitya:
siridEnum enakkini krpai sheyyum ayyE marudamalai uraiyum varada pratApanE


anupallavi

  perum pEru peravun tiru nAmam tanai nAn maravAdu dinandOrum manadArat-tudippEn


caraNam    murugA tirumAl marugA paramashivanAr perumaikkuriya guhA gurupara SaNmukhA
karuNAkara kandanE kArtikEyanE ena karudi enaduLLam karaindurugum pOdu
